subject: CNN.com Daily Top 10
body:
CNN.com Daily Top 10


































Women's baths explodes, 3 dead
A boiler in a women's spa exploded Tuesday, killing three people, officials said.

The Shot: Chilling crash video
CNN's Anderson Cooper has the shot-- an Australian helicopter crashing into a ship and then falling into the ocean.
